properties.name: House on Petts Wood Road
properties.description: A stunning five-bedroom detached house situated in a prestigious area of Orpington. The property offers spacious living with a large reception room, formal dining area, and a modern kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances. Upstairs, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, and the four other bedrooms are all generous in size. The property also includes a double garage, ample parking space, and a beautifully landscaped garden.

Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year  guarantee.

This four bedroom detached family home is located in a desirable area close to local amenities and schools. The spacious lounge and dining area leads into a conservatory, providing ample natural light. The kitchen is fully fitted with modern appliances, and there is a separate utility room. Upstairs, there are four generously sized bedrooms, with an en-suite bathroom to the master. The rear garden is large and well-maintained, ideal for family activities.

This modern one bedroom flat is perfect for first-time buyers or investors. The property is well-presented throughout, with a bright and airy living room and a fully fitted kitchen. The bedroom is spacious with built-in wardrobes, and the bathroom features a three-piece suite. Located just a short walk from the town center and local transport links.

A stunning five-bedroom detached house situated in a prestigious area of Orpington. The property offers spacious living with a large reception room, formal dining area, and a modern kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances. Upstairs, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, and the four other bedrooms are all generous in size. The property also includes a double garage, ample parking space, and a landscaped garden.

This modern three-bedroom flat is located in a quiet residential area close to local amenities. The spacious open-plan living area leads into a well-fitted kitchen with integrated appliances. The three bedrooms are all of good size, and the family bathroom includes both a shower and a bathtub. The property benefits from private parking and access to communal gardens.

This charming three-bedroom semi-detached house is located in a popular residential area, offering great potential for extension (STPP). The property features a spacious living room, separate dining area, and a fully fitted kitchen. The garden is a generous size with a paved area for outdoor dining. Upstairs, there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom. The property also benefits from off-street parking and a garage.
